page.title: 14My Clothes
page.content: My name is Neil Winterson.I am ten years of age and attend Perry Court Junior School. When I go to school I wear grey or blue trousers and a blue shirt.My shirt is 65% polyester and 35% cotton.My socks are cotton and I generally wear trainer shoes.I do not like wearing uniform because I sit by a sunny window in class and I perspire but it is not too bad when I have got on a short-sleeved shirt.My favourite clothes are jeans (they are a kind of denim trouser),a t-shirt and some old trainers. Sometimes I wear my newer jeans on Sunday for Sunday best.Most of my friends wear jeans because the latest fashion is jeans.I have quite a lot of different sorts of jeans.I would like to wear jeans to school.
